abstract: Citigroup could start by catching up with other big Wall Street banks and releasing how much capital it has supporting its investment banking unit.
snippet: Citigroup could start by catching up with other big Wall Street banks and releasing how much capital it has supporting its investment banking unit.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup‘s chief executive, Vikram S. Pandit, likes to talk about transparency, and on Wednesday he repeated his call for new ways to compare the risks at different banks.

headline.main: How Citi Could Be More Transparent
